name: garmin-grafana
description: Garmin-Grafana is a self-hosted pipeline that extracts Garmin health metrics and visualizes them in Grafana dashboards. It lets users monitor activity, sleep, and performance without uploading personal data to third-party clouds.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Extract health and fitness metrics from Garmin devices for self-hosted analysis

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize activity, sleep, heart rate, and performance data in customizable Grafana dashboards

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Keep personal health data on your own infrastructure without third-party cloud services

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Analyze training load, VO2 max, recovery time, and other advanced fitness indicators

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Schedule automatic data extraction from Garmin Connect for continuous monitoring
